lines.text: Calm down, my child. Wait until you're married to start hitting him
I'll never marry that big gorilla!
You've proven yourself a hero. You may now marry this beautiful girl.
By the way, I forgot to mention that I'm already married.
Ungrateful daughter! How dare you strike your father!
This is crazy! You beat up my daughter and she jumps into your arms!
Look, this is only a two reeler. We don't have time to build up to love scenes.
